name: Beasts & Beats
description:
What are you even saying?  This Queen does no need to be saved.

Follow the beat, my Queen. Destroy your old band, The Court of Music in a descent through a musical dungeon. Avoid sound discharges and blow up your enemies eardrums with your loyal Trumpet-gun. Get your revenge at last.

Use WASD to move around and the mouse to aim and to make your loyal Trumpet-gun thunder.

  • Juan Francisco Mora Palomino - @JfranMora - [Programming / Game Design / Audio / UX]
  • Sergio Font Gomez - @Bardolimo [2D Art / Game Design / Level Design]
  • Adrián Moreno Gómez - @AdriMG96  [3D Art]
